doc.after: Food is any substance that can be consumed usually composed primarily of carbohydrates fats minerals water and or proteins that can be eaten or drunk and metabolized by almost all multicellular entities for nutrition or pleasure Items considered food may be sourced from plants animals or other categories such as fungus Ranching farming fishing hunting foraging and other methods are ways to obtain food
